title: FS (Prices reduced) Two graded T213-2's Jennings (sold) and Huggins

posts.post_title: FS (Prices reduced) Two graded T213-2's Jennings (sold) and Huggins
posts.post_content:
For Sale (prices reduced) -

T213-2 Hughie Jennings both Hands Showing - PSA 3  SOLD

T213-2 Miller Huggins Coupon Cigarettes - SGC 2 (The image has great colors)  $320 Venmo no fee or $332.50 pp gs.  

Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.  Bob I.
